extension.name: Youyork Module Slider
extension.author: YouJoomla.com
extension.description: Youyork Module Slider Module ver 1.0.1 for Joomla 1.6x and UP

field.name: is_copy
field.label: Is this module copy?
field.description: If this is module copy that runs on same page simply add any suffix to avoid conflict. Please make sure there are no spaces. Example:_mysuffix instead mysuffix

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description: You can create custom module templates for Youyork Module Slider Simply copy modules/mod_youyork_slider/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking. Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here. You can also copy your template folder to your template/html/mod_youyork_slider/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New

field.name: slider_width
field.label: Slider width
field.description: Should not be wider than the module holding div container

field.name: module_pozi
field.label: York Modules
field.description: Enter modules you want to display seperated by comma.Note:The modules must be published on All pages. Suggestion:Create addtional module positions like , Slider1 , Slider2 and use these. For Joomla1.0 go to Site - Template Manager - Module Positions and create new ones, for Joomla 1.5 open templatedetails.xml , find positions tag and add your new module positions

field.name: module_title
field.label: York module title
field.description: Enter titles in same order as modules above seperated by comma

field.name: visible_modules
field.label: Visible Intro items
field.description: Set the number of visible intro items on page load

field.name: effectDuration
field.label: Effect durration
field.description: Slide transition effect duration. Defined in milliseconds.1 sec = 1000

field.name: autoslide
field.label: Autoslide
field.description: This is auto slide duration between the slides. If set to 0 slider will not slide automatically

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
